code: @Override @Before public void setUp() throws Exception {     super.setUp().     prepareFtpServer(). }

@Test public void testPollFileAndShouldBeMoved() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedMessageCount(1).     mock.expectedBodiesReceived("Hello World this file will be moved").     mock.assertIsSatisfied(). }

private void prepareFtpServer() throws Exception {     // prepares the FTP Server by creating a file on the server that we want to unit     // test that we can pool and store as a local file     Endpoint endpoint = context.getEndpoint(getFtpUrl()).     Exchange exchange = endpoint.createExchange().     exchange.getIn().setBody("Hello World this file will be moved").     exchange.getIn().setHeader(Exchange.FILE_NAME, "hello.txt").     Producer producer = endpoint.createProducer().     producer.start().     producer.process(exchange).     producer.stop().     // assert file is created     File file = new File(FTP_ROOT_DIR + "/movefile/hello.txt").     assertTrue("The file should exists", file.exists()). }

public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     // assert the file is pre moved     File file = new File(FTP_ROOT_DIR + "/inprogress/hello.bak").     assertTrue("The file should have been moved", file.exists()). }

public void configure() throws Exception {     from(getFtpUrl()).process(new Processor() {          public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {             // assert the file is pre moved             File file = new File(FTP_ROOT_DIR + "/inprogress/hello.bak").             assertTrue("The file should have been moved", file.exists()).         }     }).to("mock:result"). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from(getFtpUrl()).process(new Processor() {                  public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {                     // assert the file is pre moved                     File file = new File(FTP_ROOT_DIR + "/inprogress/hello.bak").                     assertTrue("The file should have been moved", file.exists()).                 }             }).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
